project.name: Stall Profiling

property.name: dvt.activity.description
property.value: Count the number of data and program cache stall cycles (L1P Miss Stalls, L1D Read Miss Stalls and L1D Write Buffer Full Stalls).

project.dvt.property:
version=1.0.0 dvt.activity.priority = 50
dataproviders=Trace Trace.name=Trace Viewer Trace.analyzer=Stall Cycle Profiler
